entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, referred to as 'he' and 'Harry'.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A wise and powerful wizard who is the headmaster of Hogwarts. He is referred to as 'Dumbledore' and is described as turning his back on Fudge.

entities.name: fudge
entities.description: The Minister of Magic, who is goggle-eyed and speechless in the presence of Dumbledore. He is referred to as 'Fudge'.

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: A school for magic, where Dumbledore is the headmaster. It is mentioned that letters addressed to the headmaster will find Harry.

entities.name: portkey
entities.description: An object used by Dumbledore to transport Harry away from Fudge and Hogwarts. It is described as a golden head of a statue.

relationships.description: Dumbledore gives Harry the Portkey, which is used to transport him away from Hogwarts.
Dumbledore dismisses Fudge by turning his back on him and ignoring his attempts to speak.
